summary: Primary command and control for global operations. Houses main archival servers and rapid response teams.
Investigate anomalous energy signatures and temporal distortions reported in the Shibuya district.
A high-energy spectral event has occurred. Containment fields are failing. Immediate action required.
Subterranean facility for agent recovery and resupply. Low profile, heavily shielded.
A series of disappearances have been linked to a specific region in the Mojave. Investigate potential entity involvement.
